snippet: A Glenn Ligon painting at the National Gallery of Art, a John Cage score at the Museum of Modern Art, a new cultural exchange at Asia Society, and a new modern art curator headed for the Metropolitan Museum of Art.
abstract: Carol Vogel Inside Art column; Glenn Ligon painting is acquired by the National Gallery of Art; Museum of Modern Art acquires John Cage composition; Asia Society begins a new cultural exchange; Nicholas Cullinan is the new modern art curator for the Metropolitan Museum of Art.
lead_paragraph: A Glenn Ligon painting at the National Gallery of Art, a John Cage score at the Museum of Modern Art, a new cultural exchange at Asia Society, and a new modern art curator headed for the Metropolitan Museum of Art.

headline.seo: A Glenn Ligon at National Gallery; John Cage at MoMA
headline.main: National Gallery of Art Acquires Glenn Ligon Painting
headline.print_headline: National Gallery of Art Acquires Glenn Ligon Painting
